============================

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: csrf_protect

.. py:data:: requires_csrf_token

.. py:data:: ensure_csrf_cookie

.. py:function:: csrf_exempt(view_func)

   Mark a view function as being exempt from the CSRF view protection.
